dict.acceptation: 过道，走廊；大厅，前厅；娱乐中心，会所；

sent.orig: The extraordinary Hall effects were compared by using Berger side-jumping model.
sent.trans: 对于非常 Hall效应，应用 Berger的侧向跳跃模型进行了比较。

sent.orig: Fractional Hall effect is described in an universal formalized theory of fraction-dimension calculus.
sent.trans: 给予分数Hall效应以普遍的分数微积分数学形式理论描述 。

sent.orig: In this paper, a small Hall current sensor made from a GaAs Hall component is introduced.
sent.trans: 介绍了一种利用砷化镓霍尔元件设计的微型霍尔电流传感器。

sent.orig: VIP Room, Juxian Hall and Siji Hall are suitable for training and work session.
sent.trans: 贵宾厅、贤厅和四季厅等会议室适合举办各类培训、作会议。

sent.orig: Hall of Western Sichuan Folk Housing Sculpture and Hall of Modern & Contemporary Painting and Calligraphy.
sent.trans: 川西民居雕刻馆和近现代书画陈列馆。
